welcome:
Welcome to Mi Bolsillo! 👋

I can help you manage your bills and expenses. Here's what I can do:

📋 *List Bills*: "Show my bills" or "List my recent expenses"
📊 *Summary*: "How much did I spend last month?" or "Summary of this month"
📸 *Upload Bill*: Just send me a photo of your bill/receipt

Try asking me something!
bill_saved:
✅ *Bill saved successfully!*

🏪 Merchant: %s
💰 Total: %s %.2f
📅 Date: %s
📝 Items: %d

You can view all your bills by asking "show my bills"
no_bills: 📋 You don't have any bills yet. Send me a photo of a receipt to get started!
no_bills_summary: 📊 You don't have any bills yet. Send me a photo of a receipt to get started!
unknown_intent:
I'm not sure what you're asking for. Here's what I can help with:

📋 *List Bills*: "Show my bills" or "List my recent expenses"
📊 *Summary*: "How much did I spend last month?"
📸 *Upload Bill*: Send me a photo of your receipt
error_understand: ❌ Sorry, I couldn't understand your request. Please try again.
error_retrieve_image: ❌ Sorry, I couldn't retrieve your image. Please try again.
error_download_image: ❌ Sorry, I couldn't download your image. Please try again.
error_read_image: ❌ Sorry, I couldn't read your image. Please try again.
error_parse_bill: ❌ Sorry, I couldn't parse your bill. Please make sure the image is clear and try again.
error_save_bill: ❌ Sorry, I couldn't save your bill. Please try again.
error_retrieve_bills: ❌ Sorry, I couldn't retrieve your bills. Please try again.
error_processing_message: ❌ Sorry, I couldn't send you a processing message. Please try again.
